CECF99E64061E52090F5A097146D5A69: Handles the settings of the Rift Point
56C019304C6993458E200F932810E796: Use this to define the settings of the Rift Point in your experience.

UserOptionDefinition.Device_ApparatusManager_C.DetonationTime: Determines how long the Rift Point takes to detonate.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ApparatusManager_C.Damage.Descrip: Determines how much damage the Rift Point does to Players in range when it detonates.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ApparatusManager_C.ExplosionRadiu: Determines if the explosion radius of the device is visible while outside of gameplay.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ApparatusManager_C.DefuseTime.Des: Determines the time it takes to defuse the Rift Point.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ApparatusManager_C.PlantTime.Desc: Determines the time it takes to plant the Rift Point.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ApparatusManager_C.ExplosionRadiu: Radius from the Rift Point plant location that the detonation will be deadly.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ApparatusManager_C.OnAgentEntered: Sends an event when an agent enters the volume.
Sends an event when an agent exits the volume.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ApparatusManager_C.OnDefuseCancel: Sends an event when defusing the Rift Point is interrupted, passing in the defusing player.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ApparatusManager_C.OnPlantCancele: Sends an event when planting the Rift Point is interrupted, passing in the planting player.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ApparatusManager_C.OnDefuseStarte: Sends an event when the Rift Point begins to be defused, passing in the defusing player.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ApparatusManager_C.OnPlantStarted: Sends an event when the Rift Point begins to be planted, passing in the planting player.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ApparatusManager_C.OnDetonated.De: Sends an event when the Rift Point detonates, passing in the planting player.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ApparatusManager_C.OnDefused.Desc: Sends an event when the Rift Point is defused, passing in the defusing player.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ApparatusManager_C.OnPlanted.Desc: Sends an event when the Rift Point is planted, passing in the planting player.
The class who can defuse the Rift Point.
The class who can plant the Rift Point.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ApparatusManager_C.DefusingTeam.D: The team who can defuse the Rift Point.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ApparatusManager_C.PlantingTeam.D: The team who can plant the Rift Point.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ApparatusManager_C.ExternalVolume: Use an external volume as the Rift Point Planting Zone
